content: I've been playing with OpenVDB the past couple days and am really liking what I'm seeing. I think we can use this in our VOL primitive and possibly as a boolean evaluation method. Demonstrating forthcoming... :)
libged depends on OpenVDB now. Are we supposed to install the development package?
@Daniel Rossberg it should still be optional
I have not looked yet at how it’s packaged on Linux but would imagine it being the dev package
It was originally ON in the top level but is off now. Won’t be required until after git migration and after src/other sub module break out.
First, it broke my build. But, after you made it optional, it worked for me (without using the OpenVDB).
